comments:
I copied a whole Workspace to from one PC to another. On both machines I have
eclipse 3.0.M8 running.
However, the workspace copy on the second machine cannot be used with eclipse.

Whenever I try to open a Java file I get an error dialog (10 times!) saying
"More info in the logs"
The .log is full of exceptions like this one:

Are you saying that you copied the workspace while it was still open?

No I've closed eclipse on the original workspace. However, I must admit that I
copied the workspace over an old copy on the destination PC. I tried it again
yesterday with an empty destination directory - and it worked. You probably can
drop the bug report. - Sorry for bothering you!
